page.title: 13CLIMATE
page.content: The area has a temperate{climate mainly wet, warm winters and wet, warmer summers Because of the height, hills and close proximity to the{Atlantic}coast there is a varied, localised weather pattern. This brings hill mists and strong gales and if the latter coincides with, snowy conditions the area becomes encased in drifts. When the main road becomes blocked with snow the village can become isolated for days.This brings problems, particularly to the hillside farmers. However, the rescue services are swiftly employed and helicopters drop food supplies or transport the sick to hospital. Thus, the community spirit which often arises out of difficult situations is not unknown in the district & children enjoy enforced holidays when school is inaccessible.
